titleStmt.title: The triumphs of peace, or, The glories of Nassaw a Pindarick poem, occasioned by the conclusion of the peace between the Confederacy and France / written at the time of His Grace the Duke of Ormond's entrance into Dublin in Ireland, by Mr. John Hopkins.
titleStmt.author: Hopkins, John, fl. 1700.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
